items.title: Foundations of International Political Economy
items.headline: Explore the Political Institutions, International Organizations, and Social Considerations that Shape the Global Economy
objectives_summary: Identify the role that the WTO, GATT, and IMF have in facilitating international trade
Understand competing theories of international political economy
Use the Gini Coefficient, PPP, and MPI are used to understand global poverty and inequality

A thorough understanding Global Business practices!

items.title: Oil Market Analytics Fundamentals
items.headline: Complete overview of available databases in the oil and gas sector
objectives_summary: You will learn about publicly available and free databases that you can use to prepare your own reports
Thanks to this course, you will no longer have to copy charts / tables from someone else's publications, but you will be able to prepare such materials yourself
You will learn what sources energy, analytical and research companies are using to analyse oil market trends
